attributes.action: to regulate with greater care social network websites to avoid identity theft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petitions purpose for members of the public whose personal details and pictures have been stolen and used on the internet on social networks such as Hi5, Facebook, Shaadi.com,Bebo etc.
The action taken should be either complete ban of these websites, Or using proof of ID (i.e credit cards) for verification, Or for students to join through a school network. This would also help limit pedophiles posing as youthful teens.
